column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////They really load on the toppings
column4: and sauce.  The sauce is actually really tasty.  If you like cheese and sauce
column5: you will love deep dish!  I am not a huge fan of the thick crust
column6: but i did like the edge crust for its crispiness.  The thick crust does help to absorb all the flavor
column9: but you get filled up quick.  This pizza is hearty and requires the use of fork and knife to eat!  And large is was more than enough for 4 of us.
